nodes.text: Gonk's Infinite Loop was the name given to a yard in the Attis Station complex on the planet Quesh during the Cold War and Galactic War. During the Quesh war, it was patrolled by a battle droid belonging to the Hutt Cartel that had gone rogue and attacked anything in sight.

Gonk's Infinite Loop appears as a Heroic area on Quesh in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011. It is the location of the planet's world boss, the Rogue Cartel Warbot.
